name: Crooked City
blurb: Your choices shape the city\u2019s future in this open-world episodic crime drama action RPG game for PC, Console, and Mobile/Tablet.

rewards.reward: THE GRATUITY PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nWe know it's not easy being a baller on a budget, but we appreciate every donation, and for this you have our thanks in the form of a \u201cThank You\u201d email from the Crooked City development team.

THE NOTORIETY PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nWho doesn't want their name in the game? Donating $5 bucks makes you a part of the gang, and puts your name in the ending credits of Crooked City. (plus our "Thank You" email)

THE PLAYER PACKAGE \r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nCrooked City is hard on a player, but contributors at this level will receive their very own digital copy of the game! (plus name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE TOURIST PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nIt costs a lot to make a trip to the "City That Never Sleeps", but at this level you'll be able to say "Greetings from Crooked City" with your special set of postcards. (plus a copy of the game, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE CRIMINAL PROFILE PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nCrooked City has an underworld so deep you could get lost, but donating $70 will give you a personal look inside the life of Crooked City's Criminal Kingpin in the form of a prologue comic book. (plus a copy of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE RETRO PACKAGE \r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nRemember when games still came in boxes with complete manuals? When you donate $100 you will be taken back in a gaming time machine with your own throwback box featuring exclusive art, as well as a complete manual, and a floppy disk with your redemption code for Crooked City! (plus a copy of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE POKER NIGHT PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nAfter a long week of playing Crooked City alone, you're going to want to have your friends over for Poker Night! With this package you receive 5 copies of the game, and a limited edition poker set complete with custom case, chips, and cards all featuring Crooked City's logo and game art. (plus a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE PLAYBOY PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nEver wondered what it would be like to attend a Las Vegas Launch Party? At this level you and guest of your choice will be guests of honor at the Crooked City Launch Party. (plus two copies of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

- - - - CYBER MONDAY EDITION - - - - - - - - - - The Gangsta Package - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Same package as The Gansta Package (see below) but offered at a special rate for a limited time for early backers.

THE GANGSTA PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nNo unregistered weapons or illegal substances in this package, but your contribution will give you the opportunity to make an appearance as one of Crooked City's NPC gangstas. (plus a copy of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

- - - - CYBER MONDAY EDITION - - - - - - - - - - The Tycoon Package - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Same package as The Tycoon Package (see below) but offered at a special rate for a limited time for early backers.

THE TYCOON PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nTrump, Cuban and every other big money player is looking up at you. Purchasing this premiere package gives you the opportunity to have your very own casino in Crooked City with a theme of your choice. (plus a copy of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)

THE HIGH ROLLER PACKAGE\r\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - \r\nIt's time for you to have one of those weekends that stays in Vegas, and if you donate at this level we will fly you and a guest to Las Vegas, put you both up in a hotel, and invite you both to party with us as we celebrate the release of the game all weekend. (plus two copies of the game, a set of postcards, name in credits and our "Thank You" email)
